title: It Happened in Palm Beach: A Romance Novel
description: When she spends a week in Palm Beach as the guest of her wealthy aunt, Tracy Hart, a 36-year-old literary agent, meets two handsome, talented men who turn her world upside down. Which of them can she trust? Can either of them help her overcome her fears about her dangerous ex-husband back in New York? When one of the men deceives her, she finds with the other a new life in Central Florida. This psychologically taut romance moves from NYC to Florida, then to Italy, bringing alive these vibrant locales along with the struggle of a single woman to bury the past and find happiness.
author: Kitty Fleming
